features: Convenient Storage: Remote control holder comes with two compartments, each of which can hold 2 to 3 remotes. small but efficient, the perfect way to de-clutter holds your remotes. you don't have to spend any time chasing down remotes

Versatile Use: DRASTAR supply organizer is not just for remotes, but can also be used to organize other small items such as glasses, pens, cosmetics, and name cards. It's perfect for any room in the house, including the living room, bedroom, or office

Durable Material: The TV remote holder is handcrafted from 100% solid pine wood, lightweight and sturdy, 6.5"x4"x4"(exterior measurement), this bedside organizer for nightstand organized your different remotes while not taking up a lot of space

Easy Access: The remote organizer's open design allows for quick and easy access to all your remotes, making it simple to find the one you need without searching, farmhouse remote control storage box adds aesthetic value to your room

Good Gift: The remote caddy for table is a must-have at home, and it makes a good gift for family members or friends. If you have any problems with the product, please feel free to contact us, and we will deal with it within 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but wood is not perfect and edges sharp
reviews.reviewText: In theory this is a nice idea and nice box. It is much smaller than expected but I suppose you could see that in their photos but also not exactly shown next to a hand for scale. Mine has very sharp corners, edges and corner joints making little spikes. If you reach for a remote at night you’re going to hit them and get poked or scratched. Also there are no rubber or flyer feet so I’ll add those. And also mine had one end with a greenish tint and one side that is split and 2 pieces of wood glued together with different colors so it looks bad. And you can’t in my case turn it to the back as mine needs to go end back on the table. A good start but not as refined as it could be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and functional
reviews.reviewText: I like the solid white (I don’t like “distressed” or “antiqued” finishes) with the black lettering. There is space for several remotes in the two sections and handles on the sides for easy moving. While I don’t need the “Remotes” label, it is in a fun font and is a pretty contrast to the white box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure if this remote box would be a good quailty and was very pleased when it arrived. It was packaged well, is sturdy and looks great. It is nice to have all the remotes in one location and adds to the rooms decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great size for the 4 remotes we had on a table. It's very nice looking and we really appreciate having something to corral our remotes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty remote holder
reviews.reviewText: I really like this little box for all the remotes, looks pretty and have a lot of space for all my remotes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute piece to spice up your entertainment area

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a box that hold remotes. Works well when used but when kid leaves remote on couch or floor and dog chews remote, can blame this box. 4 stars for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I was always searching for my remotes. Now they’re all in one spot and the box looks cute on the bottom shelf of my coffee table.
